main event: A UFO sighting report was filed by the U.S. military on January 8, 1962, describing a disc-shaped object that disappeared over the horizon.
interesting points: The UFO was observed at an estimated size of a planet, The sighting took place during daylight hours with average visibility, The object had characteristics similar to a satellite, The UFO was noted to have an estimated velocity twice that of the satellite Echo, There was insufficient data for a definitive identification of the object.
witness description: military personnel aboard a high-flying reconnaissance jet at 33,000 ft
